thread.title: 49ers notes: Defense bends but won’t break
thread.title_full: 49ers notes: Defense bends but won’t break

author:
Matt Barrows 
mbarrows@sacbee.com
title: 49ers notes: Defense bends but won’t break
text:
49ers with Matt Barrows 
The premier blog for news and insights on the San Francisco 49ers 49ers’ Michael Wilhoite (57) intercepts a Joe Flacco pass intended for Ravens wide receiver Kamar Aiken (11). Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers head coach Jim Tomsula enters the field on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 before the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Fans were entertained by flame throwers on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers tight end Vance McDonald (89) is upended by Baltimore Ravens inside linebacker C.J. Mosley (57) after gaining ten yards in the first quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) scrambles away from Baltimore Ravens outside linebacker Courtney Upshaw (91) in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers nose tackle Ian Williams (93) pressures Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco (5) in the first quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens cornerback Jimmy Smith (22) drops a sure interception in first quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco (5) is chased out of the pocket by San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Steve Smith (89) catches a ball for a three yard gain in the 2nd quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) throws a touchdown pass to wide receiver Torrey Smith (82) in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker Michael Wilhoite (57) intercepts a Joe Flaco pass intended for Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Kamar Aiken (11) in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker Michael Wilhoite (57) is congratulated by teammate Eric Reid (35) on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 after a interception in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens inside linebacker C.J. Mosley (57) and San Francisco 49ers fullback Bruce Miller (49) get tangled up in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) ran for only 10 yards on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Steve Smith (89) drops a pass in the end zone in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers cornerback Tramaine Brock (26) and teammate cornerback Kenneth Acker (20) touch fist following a defensive stop in the second quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens kicker Justin Tucker's (9) left foot gives as he misses a field goal attempt in the fourth quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers wide receiver Anquan Boldin (81) catches a fifty one yard pass from quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) in the fourth quarter as he is defended by Baltimore Ravens cornerback Jimmy Smith (22) on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers wide receiver Anquan Boldin (81) is surrounded by teammates after injuring himself following a fifty one yard pass catch from quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) in the fourth quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers wide receiver Quinton Patton (11) celebrates after catching a touchdown pass in the fourth quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco (5) calls an audible from the line in the fourth quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers running back Carlos Hyde (28) picks up four yards in the fourth quarter on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers free safety Eric Reid (35) deflects the hail mary pass intended for Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Steve Smith (89) on the final play of the 49ers 25-20 win on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com Baltimore Ravens head coach John Harbaugh leaves the field on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 following the 25-20 loss in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick (7) was all smiles as he leaves the field of play following the 49ers 25-20 victory on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com San Francisco 49ers tight end Vernon Davis (85) leaves the field following the 49ers 25-20 victory on Sunday afternoon, October 18, 2015 in the NFL game between the San Francisco 49ers and Baltimore Ravens. Jose Luis Villegas jvillegas@sacbee.com 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick says during postgame interview "we are a 2-4 football team that needs to get some more wins," after the 49ers beat the Baltimore Ravens 25-20. Video by Manny Crisostomo, mcrisostomo@sacbee.com ​San Francisco 49ers players, tailgaters, cheerleaders and fans get riled up and ready for their NFL game against the Baltimore Ravens at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara. Manny Crisostomo The Sacramento Bee 1 of 34
